naslov: PRODAJA - KUĆE U NIZU - POTPUNO NAMJEŠTENO - PRIVLAKA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - KUĆE U NIZU - PRIVLAKA Prodajemo stambeni kompleks od ukupno četiri kuće u nizu. Svaka kuća sastoji se od prizemlja i kata. Nalazi se 300m od mora, u blizini škole, ljekarne, trgovine, autobusne stanice.. Svi objekti su kompletno namješteni (kuhinja s aparatima, sobe s ugradbenim ormarima i krevetima, perilica rublja, TV u dnevnom boravku, stolice, kutna garnitura, ugradbeni ormar u hodniku..) S1 - se sastoji od prizemlja u kojem se nalazi ulaz, hodnik, kuhinja, blagavaona i dnevni boravak, kupaonica i vešeraj. Prizemlje je  unutarnjim stepenicama povezano s katom gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica i hodnik. Stanu pripada i vrt stvarne površine 51m2 i dva parkirna mjesta. Ukupna obračunska površina 109,84m2 - 366.488,00 EURS2 - prostire se na prizemlje u kojem se nalazi ulaz, hodnik, kuhinja, blagavaona i dnevni boravak, kupaonica i vešeraj. Unutarnjim stepenicama se ide na kat gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica i hodnik. Stanu pripada vrt stvarne površine 33m2 i dva parkirna mjesta. Ukupna obračunska površina 108,04m2 - 360.728,00 EURS3 - se sastoji od prizemlja u kojem se nalazi ulaz, hodnik, kuhinja, blagavaona i dnevni boravak, kupaonica i vešeraj. Unutarnjim stepenicama se dolazi na kat gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica i hodnik. Stanu pripada vrt površine 34m2 i dva parkirna mjesta. Ukupna obračunska površina 108,14m2 - 361.048,00 EUR S4 - se sastoji od prizemlja u kojem je hodnik, kuhinja, blagovaona i dnevni boravak, kupaonica i vešeraj. Unutarnjim stepenicama se ide na kat gdje se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, kupaonica i hodnik. Stanu pripada vrt stvarne površine 95m2 i dva parkirna mjesta. Ukupna obračunska površina 114,24m2 - 380.568,00 EUR Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar FOR SALE - TERRACED HOUSES - PRIVLAKA We are selling a residential complex consisting of four terraced houses. Each house consists of a ground floor and a first floor. It is located 300 meters from the sea, near a school, pharmacy, shop, and bus station. All units are fully furnished (kitchen with appliances, bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and beds, washing machine, TV in the living room, chairs, corner sofa, built-in wardrobe in the hallway, etc.). S1 - The ground floor includes an entrance, hallway, kitchen, dining room, and living room, bathroom, and laundry room. The ground floor is connected by internal stairs to the first floor, where there are three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. The apartment also includes a garden of 51m² and two parking spaces. Total calculated area 109.84 m² – 366.488,00 EUR S2 - Spanning the ground floor, which includes an entrance, hallway, kitchen, dining room, and living room, bathroom, and laundry room. Internal stairs lead to the first floor, where there are three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. The apartment also includes a garden of 33m² and two parking spaces. Total calculated area 108,04m2 - 360.728,00 EUR S3 - Comprising a ground floor with an entrance, hallway, kitchen, dining room, and living room, bathroom, and laundry room. Internal stairs lead to the first floor, where there are three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. The apartment also includes a garden of 34m² and two parking spaces. Total calculated area 108,14m2 - 361.048,00 EUR S4 – consists of a ground floor with a hallway, kitchen, dining room and living room, bathroom, and laundry room. Internal stairs lead to the upper floor where there are three bedrooms, a bathroom, and a hallway. The apartment includes a garden of 95m² and two parking spaces. Total calculated area 114,24m2 – 380.568,00 EUR Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
